import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import api from '../services/api'; import './Dashboard.css'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [dashboardData, setDashboardData] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const [selectedPeriod, setSelectedPeriod] = useState('month'); useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardData(); }, [selectedPeriod]); const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const response = await api.get(`/reports/dashboard/?period=${selectedPeriod}`); setDashboardData(response.data); } catch (err) { setError('Failed to load dashboard data'); console.error('Dashboard error:', err); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const handlePeriodChange = (period) => { setSelectedPeriod(period); }; if (loading) { return (
Loading dashboard...
); } if (error) { return (

Error

{error}

); } return (

Dashboard

Welcome back, {user?.username}!

{/* Sales Summary Cards */}

Total Revenue

${dashboardData?.sales?.total_sales?.toFixed(2) || '0.00'}

{dashboardData?.sales?.total_count || 0} transactions

Total Cost

${dashboardData?.sales?.total_cost?.toFixed(2) || '0.00'}

Cost of goods sold

Profit

${dashboardData?.sales?.profit?.toFixed(2) || '0.00'}

{dashboardData?.sales?.profit_margin?.toFixed(1) || '0.0'}% margin

Inventory Value

${dashboardData?.inventory?.total_inventory_value?.toFixed(2) || '0.00'}

{dashboardData?.inventory?.total_products || 0} products

Retail Value

${dashboardData?.inventory?.total_retail_value?.toFixed(2) || '0.00'}

{dashboardData?.inventory?.low_stock_count || 0} low stock

Out of Stock

{dashboardData?.inventory?.out_of_stock_count || 0}

products need restocking

{/* Sales Chart */}

Sales Trend (Last 7 Days)

{dashboardData?.chart_data?.length > 0 ? (
{dashboardData.chart_data.map((day, index) => (
d.sales))) * 100)}%` }} title={`Sales: $${day.sales.toFixed(2)}`} >
d.sales))) * 100)}%` }} title={`Cost: $${day.cost.toFixed(2)}`} >
{new Date(day.date).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric' })}
${day.sales.toFixed(0)}
${day.cost.toFixed(0)}
))}
Sales
Cost
) : (

No sales data available

)}
{/* Recent Sales */}

Recent Sales

{dashboardData?.recent_sales?.length > 0 ? (
{dashboardData.recent_sales.map((sale, index) => (

{sale.sale_number}

{sale.customer_name || 'Walk-in Customer'}

${sale.total_amount.toFixed(2)} {new Date(sale.created_at).toLocaleDateString()}
))}
) : (

No recent sales

)}
{/* Top Products */}

Top Selling Products

{dashboardData?.top_products?.length > 0 ? (
{dashboardData.top_products.map((product, index) => (

{product.product__name}

{product.product__sku}

Sold: {product.total_sold}
Revenue: ${product.total_revenue.toFixed(2)}
Cost: ${product.total_cost.toFixed(2)}
Profit: ${product.profit.toFixed(2)}
Margin: {product.profit_margin.toFixed(1)}%
))}
) : (

No sales data available

)}
); }; export default Dashboard;
